alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 11:05AM CDT until April 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, Jackson and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 22.5 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
